sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: It starts raining, Will takes cover under the tree from the rain and starts leaning on the tree as he sits. Under normal circumstances, he would start to think.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: What kind of food would be on the table?

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: How low is the temperature on the A/C?

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Or just let Anna enjoy sleeping on top of mount everest in their cramped apartment?

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: However, now he doesnâ€™t want to think or remember any of that and just closes his eyes.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: But it makes things worse, he remembers the worst day of his life
